website_summaries.verdict: The Lenovo Z40 is a decent laptop for a nice price, but a short battery life and copious minor drawbacks keep it from pulling out from the middle of the pack.

customer_reviews.title: Best Laptop I ever had!
customer_reviews.text: I think I had wrote a review one time but just in case I didn't, I don't understand the negative reviews. It's a backup to my desktop and my many PC's in my business and I can run my entire business on this laptop. Once connected to the network, even by WI-FI, I have access to my entire network! This is an I7 and compared to 10 to 20 years ago, $2,000 for something like 10mb drives and old DOS software, this is a dream for the money. Back then, no TB drives existed, not even GB drives! GB was like a breakthrough back then, forget SSD drives and USB everything these days. I find it very sturdy as well.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Fagnant

customer_reviews.title: Nice for programming.
customer_reviews.text: I accidentally got this Laptop I meant to get another z-50 with Nvidia GPU because I mainly do graphic programming but it's fine it runs very smoothly. One thing to note is that the keyboard buttons sometimes don't press(although it says "accurate keyboard"). Some 3rd party programs that don't come with the laptop run at a weird resolution and I have yet to figure out why I've updated the drivers and I can figure it out. But other than that the laptop would be fine for light programming, Web browsing. AND MAYBE MINECRAFT, maybe. =) also I got rid of superfish instantly and this laptop did have the Trojan.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Bloatware clogged machine
customer_reviews.text: The Computer itself is not all that bad except that it tends to be much slower than the specs would imply. I gave it 2 stars because of the bloatware on the machine. It is massive and I believe that is what slows down the machine. You can't uninstall some of the bloatware (will not let you) like the McAFee garbage. I have spent 2 days trying to figure out how to get rid of it. Anyway, I would strongly recommend against this laptop. If I am ever able to get rid of the McAFee and other bloatware I may revisit.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Great Laptop!
customer_reviews.text: I love this laptop, the first thing that my friends told me when I got in a Skype call is that my mic quality got so much better. And I like to game, you can game perfectly on this computer on medium settings. The keys are smooth and overall it's lightweight, making it easy to carry around. I LOVE LOVE LOVE this laptop. I was really skeptical because I've seen some negative reviews around , but I can safely say, I'm in love with this laptop. 10/10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: When the Lenovo Z50 laptop arrived a few days after I ordered it , I was pleasantly surprised at the speed , quality and slim / light design of the computer. I was a little worried about purchasing a computer other than HP which I've exclusively owned for the past 12 years or so. I am very happy with this purchase , it's been 2 months of hard use so far and absolutely no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Michael M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: Nice machine well made with great specs. This is my second Lenovo laptop and the quality is very good. I've had this machine for a week or so it's more than I expected. It's fast and everything works just fine. If you are looking for a powerful machine that will work for years to come this is the one. I'm not sorry at all that I bought it even though my other laptop was under a year old.
customer_reviews.author: Gordie

customer_reviews.title: An i7 shoe horned into a cheap lenovo laptop.
customer_reviews.text: Firstly typing this from this machine, my wrists are being scratched by a lip of plastic around the body. Do not buy if you plan to play games. Intel HD graphics cards are complete and utter jokes. It doesn't have a multi touch track pad I can't two finger scroll or two finger right click, it's also pretty small. I will say the keyboard is nice to type on. Aside from the plastic that sticks up around the edge. And it boots quickly. If I were to summarize this laptop, its an I7 core with 8gb of ram, with the most bare bones laptop built around it. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Braeden Hamson

customer_reviews.title: but I didn't like the layout of the keyboard—which felt a little flexible ...
customer_reviews.text: I didn't care for this computer for some reason. Nothing really wrong with the machine, but I didn't like the layout of the keyboard—which felt a little flexible and flimsy, to be honest. Indeed, the whole computer seemed a bit too fragile. I gave it to my daughter after a week or so and it seems to be working out fine for her needs, so nothing was lost in the process.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking through lots of laptops, I wanted to find something affordable and strong. It has 8 GB ram and Intel Core i7-4510U, which it makes it really fast. It doesn't come with a dedicated video card, which could be bad if you will use it for gaming. Strong, fast, light, and good battery life!
customer_reviews.author: Mario J.

customer_reviews.title: This Is It
customer_reviews.text: The Lenovo Z50 Laptop was recommended to me by our IT rep at work. I needed a laptop that would be up-to-date and user friendly, at the same time. The Z50 has been both and more! I have been able to stumble along and figure things out without causing permanent damage :) I have been able to add many features from my iPad & iPhone. It is exactly what I was looking for to take the place of my desktop computer.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Cornejo

customer_reviews.title: Love this new laptop
customer_reviews.text: Love this new laptop, great speed with the enhanced internet connectivity with the dual band AC, a key feature. No issues with the hardware, has a great screen yet is reasonably lightweight. Mine came delivered with Windows 8 - what a mess that product is, so update immediately to Windows 10, which I've been running for over a month with no issues and much easier to navigate.
customer_reviews.author: Scott S.

customer_reviews.title: Laptop
customer_reviews.text: It's been a very good laptop, the battery was never great and the speaker could be improved, but overall it has been with me on my last years of undergrad and now in grad school
customer_reviews.author: Elias B

customer_reviews.title: look at the pros and cons
customer_reviews.text: Pros: overall a good laptop in terms of battery and the screen and the processor and the keyboard I'm just overwhelmed with that.😊 Cons: a little bit overpriced and the quality look and feel is just plastic and does feels cheap and cracks a little bit..
customer_reviews.author: ahmed yamany

customer_reviews.title: exceeds expectations
customer_reviews.text: It's quick, the picture is amazing, and it runs tremendously, great battery power, what's not to love, it does everything I need and so much more
customer_reviews.author: Victor Girdwood

customer_reviews.title: Best Laptop Ever!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter really loves this laptop and I'm thinking of purchasing one for my business. She said, "Mom, this is an AWESOME laptop the best I've ever had." Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: G Kidder

customer_reviews.title: Grate laptop for the price. This does have superfish ...
customer_reviews.text: Grate laptop for the price. This does have superfish installed, so go download a new copy of windows from their site and reinstall a fresh OS.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Tibu

customer_reviews.title: Keybiard dissapointment.
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard is difficult for me to typeon. Se the word typeon for example. The space bar does not work well. Also, the keys are not scooped enough on this model. I make too mny typos. See mny.
customer_reviews.author: Kay C. White

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop
customer_reviews.text: Great computer so far, purchased for college. Currently running windows 10 with no problems. Screen is very nice, very good resolution. Touchpad is decent, I usually opt for my wireless usb mouse. Keyboard is nice to type on. Battery life is decent. Kind of heavy. My only regret about buying this computer is settling for integrated graphics.
customer_reviews.author: John Adlington

customer_reviews.title: very nice.. Had issues updating to 10
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my folks, very nice.. Had issues updating to 10,but I'm sure it was operator error

customer_reviews.title: easy to type
customer_reviews.text: Fast, easy to type, everything as described, only wish the speakers were a little louder, I have to connect speakers to watch a tv show. upgraded to windows 10 with no problems
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Lee

customer_reviews.title: Really nice laptop. The specs are great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Really nice laptop. The specs are great for the price. The display is probable the best feature. The feel of the brushed aluminum is also really nice

customer_reviews.title: Very good computer, good quality good price
customer_reviews.text: It's a very good computer, there are some features that can be better like the mousepad or the sound, however the relationship price/quality is acceptable

customer_reviews.title: Bad computer
customer_reviews.text: This computer is not worth it. The sound stops working intermittently, the track-pad stutters, the video stops. It's full of bloatware. Get something else.

customer_reviews.title: Poor Speakers but otherwise great computer
customer_reviews.text: Great computer for the price. I wish I had gotten one with better speakers though

customer_reviews.title: so far so good. Only thing that's annoying is the stupid charms ...
customer_reviews.text: so far so good. Only thing that's annoying is the stupid charms bar that keeps appearing when you use the mouse sensor. Can't be helped for now unless I downgrade my Windows or wait for a new Windows version that will remove the pesky charms bar.

customer_reviews.title: Good machine
customer_reviews.text: It is a good machine. I recommend it for people who need something good but not for professionals Nice

customer_reviews.title: its a great laptop.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this laptop for almost a month now. I had been using dell for the past 7 years but decided to switch to Lenovo this time. Its a light weight portable laptop which I use for school. I have only one complain about it that the touch pad is not very smooth. Otherwise, its a great laptop.

customer_reviews.text: I love it. Only problem I have is that you have to hold "Fn" button to use the F buttons instead of the shortcuts.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars

customer_reviews.text: Perfect for on the go/mobile conference systems when paired with an external camera.

customer_reviews.text: I had problems out of the box and returned the item.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Came in excellent condition. I have been using it everyday since I got it and haven't had a single problem. I would suggest upgrading the hard drive to a SSD and the RAM to 16GB if you run lots of memory hungry applications.

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop for the price and exactly what I was ...
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop for the price and exactly what I was looking for. I use it for email and internet not gaming.

customer_reviews.title: Great rig after getting rid of all the bloatware.
customer_reviews.text: Once you get rid of all the bloatware, it's really a great machine. It runs great and looks really slick. The only problem I have is with the left mouse button. It's a bit faulty.... But I bought a refurbished one. So I'm really not complaining too much.

customer_reviews.title: Great computer
customer_reviews.text: Fast, efficient, and reliable computer. Windows 8.1 is at first intimidating but once you check it out and take it for a spin, it's not such a bad platform to work with. I love the computer speed and it's ability to learn your work patters. You will not be sorry to get this one.
customer_reviews.author: C.I.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect 10/10
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd Lenovo laptop from Amazon. They are both perfect.

customer_reviews.title: its a nice lapptop, but could have been a better product.
customer_reviews.text: Its a nice laptop for the money, better than other brands out there. I felt that the performance didnt match up to the give hardware. It isnt that fast. May its the windows 8 tom blame. Looking for playing games and uhd videos. This is not the laptop for the job. It just simply crash. i used thinkpads all my life. this model feels flimsy and cheaply built compared to my 8 year old think pad. Shipping was on time. Sealed box. Good job by the seller.

customer_reviews.text: Purchased this 2 years ago, best purchase i've made so far. still using it. 10/10 would buy again

customer_reviews.text: It is a good product, but the problem that it is very sensible. If I touch harder it shuts down.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this laptop but I'm returning it for the following reasons. 1. Wasted 1/2 day removing virus and bloatware that shipped with laptop. 2. Battery died after 4 weeks and had to run without it in laptop. 3. Figured out battery problem, it wasn't seated correctly because there's a gap that you have to jiggle. IMHO poor quality control.

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had spent more and got a better laptop.
customer_reviews.text: Screws on back came out 2x within 8 months thru just normal every day usage. The LCD screen also died on me after 8 months. Wish I had spent more and got a better laptop.

customer_reviews.title: the screen is very nice looking, the keyboard feels good and responsive
customer_reviews.text: This computer does a lot of things right, the screen is very nice looking, the keyboard feels good and responsive, and after playing around with the color coordination and text size, everything looks right. There's a decent amount of bloatware, but it can be uninstalled. The biggest issue I have that keeps this computer away from 5 stars are the speakers. They really are underwhelming and lack any bass. Headphones are highly recommended with usage.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars

There is a lot of "junk"installed when you get the laptop. Nothing that can't be cleaned up fairly easily. Would I buy it again. Yes as its a desposable laptop.

I know i got it really cheap and was prepared for some imperfection, but this broken piece is still beyond my estimation. The noise of the fan is really loud. I have to settle for this laptop because I don't know how to return it to the seller.

Btw: Don't bother to install CentOS 7 on it - the installation stops at very early stage with an error message of "psmouse..." - I can't capture it fully since it disappears too quickly.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent especially when it comes to multitasking
customer_reviews.text: Be aware that most Lenovo products come pre-installed with heavy spyware, and if you're not very familiar with Windows computers, you're going to have a hard time with everyday tasks. However, no complaints other than that. It runs very well and rarely is there any delay in usage. Excellent especially when it comes to multitasking, handling very large files, music/movie editing, Photoshop, etc. Very well worth the money that you pay.

customer_reviews.title: and it is the perfect size. This is not a touchscreen model for ...
customer_reviews.text: I've used this laptop now for about a month, and it has definitely met all my needs. It starts up quickly, and it is the perfect size. This is not a touchscreen model for those who prefer that; a few friends and coworkers questioned why I wouldn't want touchscreen with Windows 8. It just wasn't what I wanted. I'm not ultra computer-savvy, but I did notice a lot of junk comes pre-installed, I'm working on removing what I don't need. I haven't tried to watch video, or play any games, so I can't speak to those things.

product_meta.title: Lenovo Z50 Laptop Computer - 59436279 - Black - 4th Generation Intel Core i7-4510U / 1TB Hard Drive / 8GB RAM / 15.6" FHD 1920x1080 Display /Dual Band Wireless AC / DVD-Drive / Windows 8.1
product_meta.description: Capacity:1TB HDD | 8GB RAMIt's about balance, not compromise. The IdeaPad Z Series Laptops are solid, stylish, portable PCs. If you're looking for a laptop with a unique mix of entertainment features, modern style, and affordable pricing, look no further. Z Series laptops are ideal for study, entertainment, online chats, and everyday use. They run on powerful multi-core processors from Intel, so they deliver smart, efficient multitasking and reliable on-demand performance - just what you are looking for in an entertainment laptop. What's more, Z Series laptops sport contemporary styling and come in a range of vivid, colorful designs. Whether you're looking for an entertainment and social networking device or shopping for a laptop with the best multimedia features you can afford, the IdeaPad Z Series is a good choice.
feature_bullets: 4th Generation Intel Core i7-4510U Processor (3.10GHz Turbo, 2.00GHz Base 1600MHz 4MB)
Full HD 1080p Display (1920x1080) with 720p HD Webcam
8.0GB PC3-12800 DDR3L SDRAM 1600 MHz / Bluetooth Version 4.0
